Clark I Anderson <anderci@...> wrote on 26.04.2004 20:48:35:

> With ZoneAlarm, I tried approving access to 127.0.0.1:????? and The test
> program ran achieving the 'green bar'.
> 
> Why is it using RemoteTestRunner?

It's just an educated guess, but I assume it uses RemoteTestRunner because 
the Eclipse IDE and the Test Cases don't run inside the same VM but 
Eclipse still wants to display the results. So it's "remote" as in "not 
inside the same virtual machine" and not as in "on another physical 
computer".

> Your suggestions will be appreciated.
> 
>                 Clark Anderson
> 

regards
Joachim Sauer
